title: Accounting I
description: Individual event focused on fundamental accounting principles.
requirements: The Accounting I objective test challenges competitors to demonstrate their understanding of fundamental accounting principles. Competitors have 50 minutes to complete 100 multiple-choice questions.

description: Individual event covering corporate and managerial accounting.

title: Mobile Application Development

requirements: The objective of this event is to design and develop a mobile application that addresses the current year's topic. For 2025-2026, the application must focus on member engagement and resource accessibility for FBLA chapters.
